iframe{visibility:hidden}.fb_dialog_content .dialog_header{-webkit-box-shadow:white 0 1px 1px -1px inset;background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0% 0%, 0% 100%, from(#738ABA), 0;vertical-align:middle;white-space:nowrap}.fb_dialog_content .dialog_header table{-webkit-font-smoothing:subpixel-antialiased;height:43px;width:100%}.fb_dialog_content .dialog_header td.header_left{font-size:12px;padding-left:5px;vertical-align:middle;width:60px}.fb_dialog_content .dialog_header    });\n</script>\n<div style=\"clear: both;\"></div>\n</div>\n<!---------what we do------------>\n\n<div class=\"what-we-do\">\n\n    <div class=\"container\">\n\n      <div class=\"row\">\n\n        <div class=\"col-xs-12 col-md-12\">\n\n          <!--<h2>What we do?</h2>-->\n\n          <div class=\"platform-title\"> <i class=\"icon-diagramm\"></i> BACKENDLESS PLATFORM</div>\n\n        </div>\n\n      </div>\n\n      <div class=\"row\">\n\n        <div class=\"col-xs-6 col-md-3\">\n\n          <div class=\"text-center\"><img src=\"/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/block3.png\" class=\"wwd-icon\"></div>\n\n          <h3 class=\"blue-border\">Backendless MBAAS</h3>\n\n          <p>Develop&nbsp;apps with the most powerful&nbsp;mobile cloud backend.&nbsp;Our mBaaS has&nbsp;everything it takes to build the best of the kind mobile apps.&nbsp;</p>        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"col-xs-6 col-md-3\">\n\n          <div class=\"text-center\"><img src=\"/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/block1.png\" class=\"wwd-icon\"></div>\n\n          <h3 class=\"green-border\">BACKENDLESS HOSTING</h3>\n\n          <p>Host your web applications in our powerful, secure and reliable hosting and file storage solution. You can store static files and generate dynamic content, run NodeJS scripts or use the storage&nbsp;for&nbsp;files for your mBaaS apps.</p>        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"col-xs-6 col-md-3\">\n\n          <div class=\"text-center\"><img src=\"/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/block2.png\" class=\"wwd-icon\"></div>\n\n          <h3 class=\"red-border\">BACKENDLESS API ENGINE</h3>\n\n          <p>Deploy your own code and&nbsp;instantly turn it into a&nbsp;highly-scalable microservice. For the deployed services&nbsp;the product&nbsp;generates client SDKs and REST APIs, provides&nbsp;powerful API Management, and tracks usage analytics.</p>       </div>\n\n        <div class=\"col-xs-6 col-md-3\">\n\n          <div class=\"text-center\"><img src=\"/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/block4.png\" class=\"wwd-icon\"></div>\n\n          <h3 class=\"orange-border\">BACKENDLESS MARKETPLACE</h3>\n\n          <p>Enhance your Backendless backend with a wide variety of offerings from our \"server-side appstore\". Get new services, database connectors, code generators and many more.</p>        </div>\n\n      </div>\n      <div class=\"row\">\n        <div class=\"col-xs-6 col-md-3\">\n\t  <a href=\"/products\" class=\"wwd-btn btn-white\">More about mBaaS</a>\n        </div>\n        <div class=\"col-xs-6 col-md-3\">\n\t  <a href=\"/products\" class=\"wwd-btn btn-white\">More about Hosting</a>\n        </div>\n        <div class=\"col-xs-6 col-md-3\">\n\t  <a href=\"/products\" class=\"wwd-btn btn-white\">More about API Engine</a>\n       </div>\n        <div class=\"col-xs-6 col-md-3\">\n\t  <a href=\"/products\" class=\"wwd-btn btn-white\">More about Marketplace</a>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n    </div>\n\n  </div>\n\n    <div class=\"what-we-do-mobile\">\n\n    <div class=\"container\">\n\n      <div class=\"row\">\n\n        <div class=\"col-sm-12\">\n\n          <h2>What we do?</h2><span class=\"sub-title\">BACKENDLESS PLATFORM</span>\n\n          <p>backendless platform includes <span class=\"number\">4 </span>basic components:</p>\n\n          <ul class=\"components\">\n\n            <li><a href=\"/products\"> <img   <div class=\"online-service-title\">USE ONLINE SERVICE</div>\n\n           <div class=\"hidden-xs\"><p>The online service is a complete installation of the Backendless Platform.    </div>\n\n    </div>\n\n  </div>\n\n<!---------feedback------------>\n\n <div class=\"feedback hidden-xs\">\n\n    <div class=\"container\">\n\n      <div class=\"row\">\n\n        <h2 class=\"home white\">what people think about us</h2>\n\n      </div>\n\n      <div class=\"row\">\n\n\n\t        <div class=\"col-xs-6 col-sm-12 col-lg-4\">\n\n          <div class=\"people-avatar clearfix\"><div class=\"avatar\"><img src=\"https://backendless.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/garymeyer.jpg\" alt=\"\"></div>\n\n            <div class=\"people-info\">\n\n              <div class=\"people-name\">Gary Meyer</div>\n\n              <div class=\"people-company\">Ski Patrol</div>\n\n            </div>\n\n          </div>\n\n          <div class=\"people-citate\"><p>The claim is true: you do not have to write your own backend for a lot of application and for a lot of common needs. It is exciting where the industry is going in the future with more APIs and the marketplace-style direction. We will see it being easier and easier to build pretty sophisticated applications and not writing any server-side code.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"/showcase/ski-patrol/\">Customer Story</a></p>\n</div>\n\n        </div>\n\n        \n\t        <div class=\"col-xs-6 col-sm-12 col-lg-4\">\n\n          <div class=\"people-avatar clearfix\"><div class=\"avatar\"><img src=\"https://backendless.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/michigan_badge.gif\" alt=\"\"></div>\n\n            <div class=\"people-info\">\n\n              <div class=\"people-name\">MaryCarol Hunter</div>\n\n              <div class=\"people-company\">University of Michigan</div>\n\n            </div>\n\n          </div>\n\n          <div class=\"people-citate\"><p class=\"p1\">Backendless was an&nbsp;easy decision as with the&nbsp;offer of a no cost service if the amount of data stored remained relatively low. If the data storage needs were to rise, the charges would be quite reasonable.&nbsp;Real time access to data allows us to keep tabs on how study participants are doing whenever necessary.<span class=\"Apple-converted-space\">&nbsp; </span>For example, this<span class=\"Apple-converted-space\">&nbsp; </span>allowed us to trouble shoot app problems with data delivery to from their phones to Backendless. As a result, we were able to improve appâs stability.</p>\n</div>\n\n        </div>\n\n        \n\t        <div class=\"col-xs-6 col-sm-12 col-lg-4\">\n\n          <div class=\"people-avatar clearfix\"><div class=\"avatar\"><img src=\"https://backendless.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/paulsagor.jpg\" alt=\"\"></div>\n\n            <div class=\"people-info\">\n\n              <div class=\"people-name\">Paul Sagor</div>\n\n              <div class=\"people-company\">Indie Developer</div>\n\n            </div>\n\n          </div>\n\n          <div class=\"people-citate\"><p>I canât believe Iâve only just discovered your service (I think I remember reading about a while back), shame on me. Iâm working on a game that would require significant scale, if it goes as planned (like we all think :-), but doesnât take a huge revenue (obviously enough to pay for the service). More of a labor of love! At least with your service, and your very reasonable rates, and no limits on the things that kill a project, I can actually achieve my goal.&nbsp;I hope my project works out with your service, but from where I sit, your service and your system appears very high quality and well designed to do the job.</p>\n</div>\n\n        </div>\n\n        \n      </div>\n\n    </div>\n\n    <div class=\"feedback-btn-group hidden-xs\">\n\n      <!--<div class=\"btn btn-white-bordered btn-white\">Take a tour</div>-->\n\n      <a href=\"https://develop.backendless.com/#registration\"><div class=\"btn btn-red btn-hvr\">Register now!</div></a>\n\n    </div>\n\n  </div>\n\n  <div class=\"feedback-mobile visible-xs\">\n\n   <div class=\"feedback-mobile-title\">what people think about us</div>\n\n    <div class=\"testimonials-mobile-slider-controls\"><a href=\"#\" class=\"left-control\" onclick=\"return false;\"><span class=\"ultra-icon\">î¯</span></a><a href=\"#\" class=\"right-control\" onclick=\"return false;\"><span class=\"ultra-icon\">î¯</span></a></div>\n\n    <div class=\"testimonials-mobile-slider owl-carousel owl-loaded owl-drag\">\n\n    \n          \n\n        \n          \n\n        \n          \n\n        \n    <div class=\"owl-stage-outer\"><div class=\"owl-stage\" style=\"transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: 0s;\"><div class=\"owl-item\"><div class=\"mobile-slide\"><img src=\"https://backendless.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/garymeyer.jpg\" width=\"64\" height=\"64\" alt=\"\">\n\n            <div class=\"slide-title\">Gary Meyer</div>\n\n            <div class=\"slide-subtitle\">Ski Patrol</div>\n\n            <div class=\"slide-desc\"><p>The claim is true: you do not have to write your own backend for a lot of application and for a lot of common needs. It is exciting where the industry is going in the future with more APIs and the marketplace-style direction. We will see it being easier and easier to build pretty sophisticated applications and not writing any server-side code.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"/showcase/ski-patrol/\">Customer Story</a></p>\n</div>\n\n          </div></div><div class=\"owl-item\"><div class=\"mobile-slide\"><img src=\"https://backendless.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/michigan_badge.gif\" width=\"64\" height=\"64\" alt=\"\">\n\n            <div class=\"slide-title\">MaryCarol Hunter</div>\n\n            <div class=\"slide-subtitle\">University of Michigan</div>\n\n            <div class=\"slide-desc\"><p class=\"p1\">Backendless was an&nbsp;easy decision as with the&nbsp;offer of a no cost service if the amount of data stored remained relatively low. If the data storage needs were to rise, the charges would be quite reasonable.&nbsp;Real time access to data allows us to keep tabs on how study participants are doing whenever necessary.<span class=\"Apple-converted-space\">&nbsp; </span>For example, this<span class=\"Apple-converted-space\">&nbsp; </span>allowed us to trouble shoot app problems with data delivery to from their phones to Backendless. As a result, we were able to improve appâs stability.</p>\n</div>\n\n          </div></div><div class=\"owl-item\"><div class=\"mobile-slide\"><img src=\"https://backendless.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/paulsagor.jpg\" width=\"64\" height=\"64\" alt=\"\">\n\n            <div class=\"slide-title\">Paul Sagor</div>\n\n            <div class=\"slide-subtitle\">Indie Developer</div>\n\n            <div class=\"slide-desc\"><p>I canât believe Iâve only just discovered your service (I think I remember reading about a while back), shame on me. Iâm working on a game that would require significant scale, if it goes as planned (like we all think :-), but doesnât take a huge revenue (obviously enough to pay for the service). More of a labor of love! At least with your service, and your very reasonable rates, and no limits on the things that kill a project, I can actually achieve my goal.&nbsp;I hope my project works out with your service, but from where I sit, your service and your system appears very high quality and well designed to do the job.</p>\n</div>\n\n          </div></div></div></div><div class=\"owl-nav disabled\"><div jQuery(document).ready(function(){\n  //jQuery( function(){\n  footerFixed();\n  //navMenu();\n // new WOW().init();\n   jQuery('.mc4wp-alert').append('<i class=\"fa fa-times\" onclick=\"closeAlert(jQuery(this));return false;\"></i>');\n  if (jQuery('#wpadminbar').length > 0) {\n\tif (jQuery(window).width() > 768) {\n\t      //$('body').css('padding-top','30px');\n\t function footerFixed() {\nconsole.log( \"in footer fixed\" );\n    var siteHeight = jQuery('.footer').offset().top + jQuery('.footer').height();\n    if (jQuery('body').height() > siteHeight + 10) {\n        jQuery('.footer').css({\n            'position':'fixed',\n            'left':0,\n            'bottom':0,\n            'width':'100%'\n        });\n    } else {\n
